prompt:
The International Atomic Energy Agency monitors the global trade in nuclear material to prevent proliferation.
Enriched uranium serves as the primary nuclear material for most civilian nuclear reactors worldwide.
Security forces raided a warehouse suspected of storing smuggled nuclear material from a former Soviet facility.
The theft of nuclear material from research labs poses a severe threat to international security.
Scientists at the facility handled nuclear material with extreme caution to avoid any radiation exposure.
Iran's nuclear program has raised concerns over the undeclared stockpiles of nuclear material.
The accident at Fukushima released traces of nuclear material into the Pacific Ocean, affecting marine life.
Border patrols are trained to detect attempts to transport nuclear material across international frontiers.
Depleted uranium, a byproduct of nuclear material processing, is used in military armor-piercing rounds.
The treaty aims to reduce the world's arsenal of weapons-grade nuclear material by verifiable means.
